wxl 2"134 - 2019 cQ,s ui 26 jeks isl=rdod - 2019'07'26

II fldgi – wêlrK

iïu; jQ mk;a ... ... ... ... —
mk;a flgqïm;a ... ... ... ... —

Y%S ,xld weme,a Widúfha oekaùï ... ... ... —

Èid wêlrK yd ufyia;%d;a wêlrK oekaùï ... 418
^fjk fjku f.dkq lr .; yels mßÈ iEu fldgilg u wh;a tla tla NdIdjlg fjk fjk msgq wxl fhdod we;'&
417 - B 081545 — 353 (2019/07)
D 1 -
  msgqj

Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%h 
 fuu .eiÜ m;%h www.documents.gov. lk fjí wvúfhka nd.; l< yel' 
i;sm;d ksl=;a jk .eiÜ m;%fhys m<lsÍu i|yd Ndr.kq ,nk oekaùï ms<sn|
jeo.;a ksfõokhhs 
Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%fha wjika msgqfõ iEu udihl u uq,a i;sfha § m<lrk ksfõok Ndr.kakd Èkhka iy fõ,djka 
ms<sn|j ñka wjOdkh fhduq lrkq ,efí'
.eiÜ m;%fha m<lsÍu i|yd oekaùï Ndr.ekSu .eiÜ m;%h m<lrkq ,nk Èkhg i;s follg fmr isl=rdod Èkfhys oyj,a 12'00 g wjika 
lrkq ,efí' ;k;=re - wenE¾;=" úNd." fgkav¾ iy fjkafoais ms<sn| oekaùïj, wjika Èk iy fõ,djka ta ms<sn|j Wkkaÿjla olajk whg m%udKj;a 
ld,fõ,djla ,efnk mßÈ fhdod.; hq;= njg" ish¨ u fomd¾;fïka;=" ixia:d iy uKav, hkdÈh j.n,d.; hq;= nj ñka wjOdrKh flf¾' m<lsÍu 
i|yd tjkq ,nk iEu oekaùula u ;ks me;af;a muKla meyeÈ,sj msgm;a l< hq;= h' ksrjoH;djh ms<sn|j lrk úuiSï iy meñKs,s 
.eiÜ m;%h m< 
jQ Èk isg f;uilg miqj Ndr.kq fkd,efí'
.eiÜ m;%fha m<lrk iEu oekaùula u .eiÜ m;%h m<lrkq ,nk Èkg i;s follg fmr ^tkï" 2019 wf.daia;= ui 16 jeks Èk m<lrk 
.eiÜ m;%fha oekaùï 2019 wf.daia;= ui 02 jeks Èk oyj,a 12'00g fyda Bg fmr& ;emEf,ka fyda f.kú;a rcfha uqøKd,hg NdrÈh hq;= h'
    2006 wxl 19 ork bf,lafg%dksl .Kqfokq mk; - 9 jeks j.ka;sh
   zzhï m%ldYkhla" Í;shla" ksfhda.hla" kshuhla" w;=re jHjia:djla" ksfõokhla fyda fjk;a lsisjla .eiÜ m;%fha m<l< hq;= njg 
hï mk;lska fyda kS;s m%{ma;shlska úêúOdk i,iajd we;s wjia:djl" ta Í;sh" ksfhda.h" kshuh" w;=re jHjia:dj" ksfõokh fyda fjk;a foh 
bf,lafg%dksl iajrEmfha jk .eiÜ m;%hl m< lrkq ,enqjfyd;a ta úêúOdkh iïmQ¾K lr we;a;dla fia ie<lsh hq;= h'˜

ie' hq' -  (i)  Ndr ,ÿm;a ^ixfYdaOk& mk;a flgqïm; 2019 cQ,s ui 12 jeks Èk Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;s%l iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%fha 
II jeks fldgfia w;sf¾lhla jYfhka m< lrk ,§' 
 (ii)  iqrdnÿ ^ixfYdaOk& mk;a flgqïm; 2019 cQ,s ui 12 jeks Èk Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;s%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%fha II jeks

II fldgi - Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%h  - 2019'07'26

Èid wêlrK yd ufyia;%d;a wêlrK oekaùï
ufyia;%d;a wêlrKh - r;akmqr
ld,h bl=;a jQ kvq jd¾;d úkdY lsÍu
fuu wêlrKfha mjrk ,ÿj" wjika lrk ,o j¾I mylg ^05& jvd mer‚ my; i|yka kvq jd¾;d fuu wêlrKfha § 
mq¿iaid úkdY lsÍug iQodkï lr we;' fuu kvq iïnkaOfhka hï md¾Yjlrejl=g ;udg wjYH kvqjl iïmQ¾K iy;sl 
l< msgm;la fyda tys hï fldgila ,nd .ekSug wjYH kï tA i|yd b,a¨ïm;% 2019'09'30 Èkg fmr frðiag%d¾jrhd fj; 
bÈßm;a l< hq;= h'
   02' tfia b,a,Sula fkdjqjfyd;a my; Wmf,aLkfha i|yka kvq jd¾;d 2019'10'07 Èfkka miqj fuu wêlrK N+ñfha 
§ mq¿iaid úkdY lrkq ,efí'
 tÉ' Ô' fÊ' wd¾' fmf¾rd"
 ufyia;%d;a - r;akmqr'

II fldgi - Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%h  - 2019'07'26

msial,a fjkafoaisfha úlsŒuhs

- tfrysj -
01'  iakema-wd¾' fldaáka.aia wekaâ"

02'  weka;kS id,sh f.dâúka rKisxy"

j¾I 2018 la jQ uehs ui 22 jk Èk we;=<;a lrk ,o ;Skaÿ m%ldYhg wkqj fuu kvqfõ meñ‚,af,a whe§fï wheo we;s mßÈ 
tlaj yd fjka fjkaj 1jk yd  2jk ú;a;slrejkag úreoaOj meñ‚,slref.a jdishg wkqj ;Skaÿj we;=<;a lrkq ,enQ njg 
m%ldY fldg wKfldg we;s fyhska o"

iïmQ¾Kfhka f.jd wjika lrkq ,nk f;la j¾Ihlg 9] l wkqm%udKhla wkqj jQ fmd,shla o iu. 1 jk yd 
2 jk ú;a;slrejka úiska meñ‚,slreg f.jk f,i ksfhda. fldg ;Skaÿ lr we;s neúka  o"
 
^wd& fuys jQ zwZ Wmf,aLkfha úia;r fldg we;s tlS bvï yd mßY%hka" tA u; msysá fjk;a ish¨ foa o" tlS bvï yd 
mßY%hka iïnkaOfhka yd tA u; jQ 2 jk ú;a;slref.a ish¨ whs;sjdislï yd ysñlï o fï kvqfjys,d we;=<;a 
lrkq ,nk ;Skaÿ m%ldYhla bgq lsÍu ms‚i meñ‚,slre úiska kS;Hdkql+, ;ykug f.k úls‚h yels 1 jk 
yd 2 jk ú;a;slrejkaf.a fjk;a hï foam, o" iu." ms<sfj,ska zzî1ZZ yd zzî2ZZ jYfhka i<l=Kq lrk ,o wxl 
2006 yd 2005 cQ,s ui 18 jk Èk ork tlS Wlia ne÷ïlrh yd wxl 3805 yd 2006 wfm%a,a ui 27 jk Èk ork 
Wlia ne÷ïlrh hgf;a yd tA m%ldrj by; lS uqo,a whlr .ekSu i|yd ne£ we;s njg yd l%shdfjys fhoúh 
yels njg" wKfldg ;Skaÿ fldg we;s neúka o"
 
^we& fuys jQ zzwdZZ Wmf,aLkfhys úia;r fldg we;s tlS bvï yd mßY%hka" tA u; msysá fjk;a ish¨ foa o" tlS bvï 
yd mßY%hka iïnkaOfhka yd tA u; jQ 2jk ú;a;slref.a ish¨ whs;sjdislï yd ysñlï o" fï kvqfjys,d we;=<;a 
lrkq ,nk ;Skaÿ m%ldYhla bgq lsÍu ms‚i meñ‚,slre úiska ks;Hdkql+,j ;ykug f.k úls‚h yels 1 jk 
yd 2 jk ú;a;slrejkaf.a fjk;a hï foam, o" iu." ms<sf,ska zzî3ZZ jYfhka i<l=Kq lrk ,o wxl 2685 yd 
2006 wfm%a,a ui 28 jk Èk tlS Wlia ne÷ïlrh hgf;a yd tA m%ldrj th l%shd;aul ùfuka by; lS uqo,a whlr 
.ekSu i|yd ne£ we;s njg yd l%shdfjys fhoúh yels njg" wKfldg ;Skaÿ fldg we;s neúka o"
